title: Remove legacy “Instamart” copy and enforce consistent “MyLocal Kart” branding (frontend)

requirements.summary: Replace any remaining user-facing “Instamart”/“InstaMart” strings across the frontend UI (including accessibility labels and metadata) with “MyLocal Kart”.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating the app as guest/customer/vendor/admin shows “MyLocal Kart” consistently and does not display “Instamart”/“InstaMart” anywhere in visible UI text (including dialogs/toasts/empty states).
The HTML document title and any other user-visible metadata rendered in the UI uses “MyLocal Kart” (not “Instamart”/“InstaMart”).
All image alt text and other accessibility labels that are user-facing use “MyLocal Kart” and do not contain “Instamart”/“InstaMart”.

file_operations.description: Update the dialog title copy to remove the legacy “InstaMart” brand string (e.g., change “Welcome to InstaMart!” to “Welcome to MyLocal Kart!”) and verify any other user-facing strings/labels in this modal do not contain “Instamart”/“InstaMart”. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Audit and ensure the document <title> and any user-visible metadata does not include “Instamart”/“InstaMart” and is consistently branded as “MyLocal Kart”.
Audit hero section copy and all accessibility text (alt/aria) to ensure there are no remaining “Instamart”/“InstaMart” strings and that branding text reads “MyLocal Kart” where applicable.
Audit and confirm the displayed brand text and logo alt text consistently use “MyLocal Kart” (and do not include “Instamart”/“InstaMart”).

Perform an app-wide audit of user-facing copy rendered from the root component tree (including toasts/dialog triggers/empty states) to ensure no “Instamart”/“InstaMart” strings remain and only “MyLocal Kart” appears as the brand name.
